price: Ese es el favor de tu Señor. ¡Ese es el gran éxito!
arabic: فَضۡلٗا مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: faḍlan min rabbika dhālika huwa al-fawzu al-ʿaẓīmu
